name: monetr
tagline: A self-hosted personal finance platform with bank integrations
description: Monetr is a self-hosted personal finance management platform that connects to banks to display transaction details, budget categories, and insights. It offers API access and real-time sync with Plaid.

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Connect to financial institutions via Plaid for automatic transaction imports and real-time balance updates

features.title: Budget Tracking
features.description: Create spending categories with monthly limits and track progress against goals with visual indicators

features.title: Expense Categorization
features.description: Automatically classify transactions by type and manually adjust categories for accurate reporting

features.title: Recurring Transactions
features.description: Identify and manage subscription payments, bills, and regular income with automated detection

features.title: Financial Insights
features.description: View spending trends, category breakdowns, and monthly comparisons through interactive charts

features.title: Goal Planning
features.description: Set savings targets and track progress with projected completion dates based on current habits

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Manage checking, savings, and credit accounts in a unified dashboard with consolidated views

features.title: REST API
features.description: Integrate with external tools or build custom workflows using REST endpoints for programmatic data access
